sentences.cn: ...克林顿作为一位感同身受倾听者的本领。

sentences.en: Even being empathetic can lead you astray if you let it cloud your judgment.
sentences.cn: 如果这影响了你的判断,即使是移情作用也可能导致你误入歧途.

sentences.en: I would try to calm the passenger down by being not only empathetic but also authoritative.
sentences.cn: 我会软硬兼施,设法让这位乘客冷静下来.

sentences.en: Smart people aren't confused , Empathetic people don't worry, Brave people aren't afraid.
sentences.cn: 知者不惑,仁者不忧, 勇者不惧.

trans.tran_cn: 移情作用的，感情移入的
trans.tran_en: Someone who is empathetic has the ability to share another person's feelings or emotions as if they were their own
